metadata.title: CVE-2021-21252 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The jQuery Validation Plugin provides drop-in validation for your existing forms. It is published as an npm package "jquery-validation". jquery-validation before version 1.19.3 contains one or more regular expressions that are vulnerable to ReDoS (Regular Expression Denial of Service). This is fixed in 1.19.3.

criterions.comment: civicrm package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
otrs2 package in hirsute is affected and needs fixing.
phpmyadmin package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:5.0.4+dfsg2-2').
